column2: Since the time of Roland, the Lycian League has been a federation of small marches, governed by largely autonomous nobles. Now these territories have been formally united into a new nation - the Kingdom of Lycia. Under your leadership, the people of the new state hope this marks the beginning of an era of peace, prosperity, and harmony in Lycia.
The Kingdom of Lycia is formed.

Since the time of Roland, the Lycian League has been a federation of small marches, governed by largely autonomous nobles. Now these territories have been formally united into a new nation - the Kingdom of Lycia. Lead by [Root.GetTitle] [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the people of the new state hope this marks the beginning of an era of peace, prosperity, and harmony in Lycia.
At your command, the Demon Dragon has created several new war dragons. They will surely prove to be capable commanders - and fearsome warriors - for your army.
